channel.title: The Mother of All Demos :: Intro CS Textbook
channel.description: The full video of the Mother of All Demos is linked below, but it is nearly 2 hours long. While weâ€™d love to have you watch the whole thing (and you are more than welcome to do so), we wanted to highlight a few of the more important parts. Listed below are the timestamps for a few important sections and a bit of discussion about each one. Feel free to skip around to watch a few of these sections to better understand what Douglas Engelbart was presenting.
